title: True Crime Addict ////// 31
description:
True Crime Addict ////// 31

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

This week author James Renner joins Nic & the Captain in the garage to discuss his latest work, the much anticipated "True Crime Addict." James will reveal his findings and insights into the disappearance of Maura Murray. He has been investigating this case for years. Find out his theory and listen in as he reveals new never heard before details about Maura's inner circle. Go to TrueCrimeGarage.com, click on the Amazon banner and pick up True Crime Addict today.

Cheers! Nic & the Captain Beer of the week: Jess by Amherst Brewing Garage Grade: 4 out of 5 bottle caps

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
